Sinigang

Ingredients

▢Pork Belly, cubed 1 kgs

▢string beans, sliced 150-200 gms

▢water spinach

▢small taro 8 nos

▢red onion, roughly chopped 1 nos

▢sinigang mix 400 gms

▢tomatoes, chopped 2 nos

▢green finger chillies 3 nos

▢Okra

Procedure

First Step: Mix egg, Place pork and chopped tomatoes in a pot.

Second Step: Add the taro then continue to simmer for 30 minutes.

Third Step: Add the sinigang mix or if using tamarind extract all the juice by wringing the muslin cloth multiple times then remove once all juice is extracted.

Fourth Step: Add green finger chillies, okra and string beans then cook for 5 minutes.

Fifth Step: While boiling add the kangkong leaves and cover, turn of the heat.

Sixth Step: Season with freshly ground black pepper and fish sauce.
